Class ADLXDisplayServicesHelper

Namespace
ADLXWrapper
Assembly
ADLXWrapper.dll

Wrapper over IADLXDisplayServices that provides cached accessors and managed/native enumeration helpers.

public sealed class ADLXDisplayServicesHelper : IDisposable

object
